document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel and her israeli counterpart benjamin netanyahu are likely to discuss a german bank providing financial services to iran when they meet this week, a source said monday.
document.title: merkel, netanyahu likely to discuss iran bank: source
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel and her israeli counterpart benjamin netanyahu are likely to discuss a german bank providing financial services to iran when they meet this week, a source said monday.
